text: Varinder Singh (16 May 1947 - 28 June 2022) was an Indian field hockey player. He won a bronze medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich. He also competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Singh was born in Jalandhar, then-British Raj. Singh died on 28 June 2022 at a private hospital in Jalandhar at the age of 75.Olympic Medalist Hockey player Varinder Singh passes away ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India Category:Indian field hockey players
title: Varinder Singh
